text: Monarrhenus is a genus of plants in the sunflower family.Cassini, Alexandre Henri Gabriel de. 1817. Bulletin des Sciences, par la Societe Philomatique 1817: 31–32 in FrenchTropicos, Monarrhenus Cass. Species include: * Monarrhenus pinifolius Cass. * Monarrhenus salicifolius Cass. ==References== Category:Inuleae Category:Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of Mauritius Category:Flora of Réunion
title: Monarrhenus
